name: The Arcade Tower
description:
You just woke up. There's a TV in front of you. You turn it on.

 

 

Climb aboard The Arcade Tower and overcome its floors by adopting the codes of this place, as mysterious as it is thrilling. Death will be your main enemy in the floors, and thinking will be your best asset.  Use magic stones to challenge logic and fight fearless enemies in the many levels of The Arcade Tower.     About the game

 

The Arcade Tower is a 2D puzzle platformer made by two french students in computer science.  Experience the adventures of this original character in a pixel art environment, giving The Arcade Tower an original graphic style, and accompanied by classical music. A controller is highly recommended to play the game. 

We hope you'll enjoy The Arcade Tower!

What's inside ? 

By downloading The Arcade Tower, you'll get:

  • 5 floors, with their own designs and ennemies
  • 35 levels (don't be affraid, it's not that much)
  • 35 musics too (to be honest, we didn't do it on purpose), most of them are reinterpreted classical musics, and others are original musics
  • Approximately 2-3 hours of playtime if you don't die too much (it's not Dark Souls either)
  • A macOS, Linux and, of course, Windows versions, depending on your favorite platform
Supporting us

Just by playing The Arcade Tower, you are already helping us! But if there's a problem you want to tell us, or just want to give us feedback, do it! It helps us a lot to make this game something you will enjoy.

You can contact us from itch or from our twitter, @ungamedstudios

 

Note: We are not responsible if you break your controller. Don't blame us.
